name: ​RELEVƎ⅃ƎЯ
description:
RELEVƎ⅃ƎЯ is a traditional platformer where every level's end is also a new beginning. Best played with a controller. Made for Godot Wildjam #20

Controls:

  • Jump / Wall Jump - Space, (A, B, X, Y on controller)
  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys, (D-pad on controller)
  • Back to Level Select / Title - Escape, (Select/Back on controller)

Ian Williams @ianawill: Programming and game design

Izumi Thorn @thornIzumi: Music/SFX and game design
